definitions.definition: A horizontal , underground stem of some plants that sends out roots and shoots ( scions ) from its nodes .
A so-called “image of thought” that apprehends multiplicities .

main_definition: ( botany ) A horizontal , underground stem of some plants that sends out roots and shoots ( scions ) from its nodes .
secondary_definitions: ( philosophy , critical theory ) A so-called “image of thought” that apprehends multiplicities .
